meaningMnemonic: If you look back in history and see someone of <kanji>exceptional</kanji> <kanji>greatness</kanji>, they're probably a <vocabulary>hero</vocabulary>. Not just a normal person, but an <vocabulary>extraordinary person</vocabulary> like Hercules or Mae Jemison.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
